body.name: Vintage Runner Rug-2x7 Washable Floral Hallway Area Rug Non-Slip Floor Cover Carpet for Living Room Bedroom Kitchen Laundry Room, Yellow
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 14 mins
features: Low Pile Design: Apply this area rug to cover up floor and bring extra soft touch to your bare feet with durable synthetic fibers. 0.3" Low profile allows for convenient placement in entryways, near doorways, and underneath furniture.

Non-Slip Backing: Anti-slip TPR textured backing helps the low pile area rug stays in place well. This carpet is kid and pet friendly and perfect for high traffic areas of your home. Make sure floors are dry underneath the rug to prevent the rug from slipping.

Durable Comfort:Low pile non-shedding surface make boho rug durable enough for daily life and high traffic areas. vintage rug with durable materials for a lightweight yet featuring soft fuzzy density surface, soft and pliable to the touch, providing great comfort for your bare feet.

Multi-applications Area Rug: Washable rug widely used for home decor, beautifully enhances any room of the home, various sizes suitable for living room, dining room, bedroom, hallway, kitchen, balcony, porch, entrance, and etc. Let your floor look more beautiful and cleaner.

Easy to care for: Our throw rug is easy to carry and unfold. Daily care can use a robot vacuum cleaner or vacuum cleaner. If needed wash, place the entire runner rug in the washing machine and wash with cold/warm water, then dry over low heat. No bleach.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This rug is very pretty. I love the pale colors they blend well with my decor. It is very soft and very well made. My favorite thing about the rug is that it is washable. I do think it is a little over priced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great and doesn't side around
reviews.reviewText: I originally got this for my hall, but it looks so good in my living room it's going to live there. It especially is nice so that my dog can get up and down off the couch without slipping on his furry feet. I really like how subtle the pattern is, it adds texture and color without drawing the eye too much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed with the color
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I do like the distressed, Boho-look of the rug which I wanted for my office. I also like how thin it is so that my desk chair can easily roll over it and it also has a rubber backing on the bottom so the rug doesn’t slip around.However, I was super disappointed with the color. The color I got was called PINIK and I believe in the description it said orange, however, the rug I got is not as vibrant as in the pictures in the listing and the color is actually a brown looking color, so it doesn’t really go that well with my office. But if you’re looking for a light brown color, this rug may be for you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice and a Good Value to Boot
reviews.reviewText: This rug looks even better in person than in the pictures. In fact, it's so nice, I hate to step on it unless I'm out of my shoes. That's why I've put it at the side of my bed, for I never wear shoes in the bedroom. None of that is to say it's at all unsuitable for use elsewhere, for it does stay in place well, looks cheerful, with a distinct pattern (printed on, but at this price, expecting a woven in fabric just isn't reasonable).I haven't had to wash it yet, but it seems durable, the backing's well sewn on, and the edges are well-stitched, making it highly unlikely to fray.I would buy this rug again, and given that it comes in various colors, next time I want to switch out a rug, I'll get another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This a a very elegant soft rug. It enhance the space and it does lay flat instantly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very thin, poor build quality
reviews.reviewText: I really like the way this rug looked in the pictures, but was disappointed with the quality of it when I received it. Hopefully, it was just the particular rug I received. There is practically no padding in it and it feels like you are steppingi straight on the floor. I hesitate to put this in front of my main entry door due to the build quality of it not being very high. It does look okay, but feels like it is going to fall apart the first time I put it in the wash. My biggest concern is the nonslip backing coming apart in the wash like other inexpensive rugs have done that I’ve owned. For now, I’m keeping this in a little used area of my floor so it can look pretty without heavy use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and well made. The colors are perfectly blended.
reviews.reviewText: This is the second Asrug Vintage rug I have ordered, and they never fail to disappoint. The color combinations are amazing and the fact they look worn and used but are still soft, clean, and durable and terrific value makes me love them even more. I use mine at the front door and in front of the bathroom vanity. These rugs are so well made, with double stitching on the non-slip backing for maximum safety. The Asrug Vintage area rugs are available in several sizes and colors; but each one is perfect for any room in your home. Highly Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and good price
reviews.reviewText: I got the long 7' runner for an entry hallway. Rug arrived nicely packed and folds come out quickly once it was straightened out. First thing you notice is how incredibly soft it is. Feels wonderful under bare feet. Colors are vibrant and stitching is done well. This rug should last a long time. Love the fact it's washable. Backing seems good and it stays put when walking on it. Overall a nice quality rug at a reasonable price.
